mapper.insert: insert into noticefile( file_no, bo_no, file_name, file_size, file_fancysize, file_mime, file_savepath, file_downcount )values( seq_noticefile.nextval, #{boNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileFancysize}, #{fileMime}, #{fileSavepath}, 0 )
mapper.update: update notice set bo_hit = bo_hit + 1 where bo_no = #{boNo}
mapper.select: select bo_no, bo_title, bo_content, bo_writer, bo_date, bo_hit from notice where bo_no = #{boNo}
mapper.update: update notice set bo_title = #{boTitle}, bo_content = #{boContent}, bo_date = sysdate where bo_no = #{boNo}
